item.title: Major7 & Vertical Mode Vs Crystal Blakk - Pure Progressive Serial Killer (Lunatic Boy Bootleg) by Global State Recordings
item.description:
Major7 & Vertical Mode Vs Crystal Blakk - Pure Progressive Serial Killer (Lunatic Boy Bootleg) by Global State Recordings

Amazing Psy track given a new lift with top class original vocals from Crystal Blakk & rubbed up by Lunatic Boy.... Buy the original version here... http://www.beatport.com/track/pure-progressive-original-mix/5052994
